nodes.text: Wrune Tsallin was a spacer during the Galactic Civil War. At some point, his starship was damaged. After getting it fixed up, Tsallin began working for Sprax and Jatayus Outbound. Knowing that he might be late to renew his license at the Bureau of Ships and Services, he asked Pyrron Nox to act as his proxy. However, Tsallin was found dead, floating in the Ac'fren Spur, dessicated and without a vac-suit. Hs ship was impounded as recompense for breach of contract with Jatayus.
